heartland_description: Your nation begins in woodlands, so there are no shortages in natural resources or wonders to bolster your citizens' imagination and mood.
Your nation begins in swamplands, so there are no shortages in natural resources or wonders to bolster your citizens' imagination and mood.
Your nation starts in an area that is easy to traverse. This is reflected in your citizens' temperament; they appreciate that your choice makes their lives a bit easier.
Your nation starts in an area that is easy to traverse. This is reflected in your citizens' temperament; they appreciate that your choice makes their lives a bit easier.

By establishing your nations on the shores of a lake you ensure a built-in mechanism for trade. Even before a road is build, merchants and travelers can reach your settlement with relative ease via boat.

By establishing your nations on the shores of a river you ensure a built-in mechanism for trade. Even before a road is build, merchants and travelers can reach your settlement with relative ease via boat.
Your nation is founded in the mountains, and it uses these natural or artificial features to bolster defense. Your citizens tend to be hale and hardy, if not stubborn to a fault.
Your nation is founded in a significant ruined location, and it uses these natural or artificial features to bolster defense. Your citizens tend to be hale and hardy, if not stubborn to a fault.
